/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -g   CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/ORBextractor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/CommonAccessMethod.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/RecTest.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/Frame.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/Binocular.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/System.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/maker_binocular.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/OpencvSLAM.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/FileOperationTool.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/Trace.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenSlam.dir/src/Optimizer.cpp.o  -o OpenSlam -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videostab.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ts.a /usr/local/lib/libopencv_superres.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_contrib.so.2.4.11 -lg2o_core -lg2o_types_slam3d -lg2o_solver_csparse -lg2o_stuff -lg2o_csparse_extension -lg2o_types_sba -lusb-1.0 -lGLU -lGL -lGLEW -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lpython2.7 -ldc1394 -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff -ldl -lm -lrt -lpthread /usr/local/lib/libopencv_nonfree.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ocl.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_gpu.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_legacy.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.2.4.11 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.11 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
